name: CapyBros
description:
Just for fun!  Will be updating this.  Currently very early alpha, just now adding in capybara graphics!  This was made using the Corgi Engine in Unity 3D.  Currently all gfx/sfx are placeholder assets!  This is just a test level to prototype.  Also, there's no level select or main menu or way to close the game other than by force closing.  Did I mention it's very early alpha?

Alpha 0.0001

- Initial release! Just a test level to prototype.  Added a Capybara face to player!

- Initial idea by KorrogonX for Capy Bros
